title: Christopher Nolan Issues A Bleak Warning To Movie Theaters
text:
Christopher Nolan Issues A Bleak Warning To Movie Theaters 
Published By: CinemaBlend.com - Today 
British filmmaker Christopher Nolan issued a bleak warning to movie theaters while speaking at the London Film Festival regarding the future...
